attributes.action: Stop the blatant abuse of the benefits system by lazy work-shy scroungers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are ALL  paying the benefits these bone idle scroungers steal, from such an easily de-frauded system to stay at home watching their large screen TVs'etc.  If they will not willingly join the Working Human race , their cushy payments should be with-drawn.
